Wallpaper or textured wall paint: If you still have access to paint, consider using wallpaper or textured wall paint to create visual interest and add depth to your walls.
Paint with fabric: Use fabric items like tablecloths, curtains, or even old t-shirts to create a textured and layered look on your walls.
Wall decals: Use wall decals to add color and pattern to your walls without the need for paint. This can be a quick and easy way to update the look of your home.
Mirrors: Hang mirrors on the walls to create an illusion of more space and add depth to your room.
Natural elements: Incorporate natural elements like plants, rocks, or seashells into your decor to bring a touch of nature indoors.
